law.catch_line: Vehicles to be disinfected, when, how.
law.text: The driver or owner of a vehicle used in conveying animals, poultry or fish or parts thereof, which the driver or owner has reason to believe died of a communicable disease, shall immediately after unloading the animals, poultry or fish or parts thereof cause the vehicle bed, tank, wheels, canvasing and covers to be disinfected with a solution of at least one (1) part of creosol dip to four (4) parts of water or with some other equally effective disinfectant approved by the department.
